name: Puzzle Cake
description:
This is my first puzzle game. It's made entirely with Puzzle Script.

If you have any suggestion or remark, know that all feedback is very welcome!

Sources are available to download.

Thanks for checking the game ;-)

Controls :

  • WASD or arrows to move
  • R : Restart
  • Z : Cancel your previous moves

Update 1.1 : Added a bunch of levels to smooth out the difficulty curve.
